Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.test.junit4

[Groovy] Class JUnit4GrailsTestType

      • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.test.junit4.JUnit4GrailsTestType

      • An GrailsTestType for JUnit4 tests.

        deprecated:
        No longer used to support alternate JUnit4 test runners
